title: Rahul Bajaj | 1938-2022: India Inc loses a voice that spoke without fear, for business and values - The Indian Express
content:
1. Rahul Bajaj | 1938-2022: India Inc loses a voice that spoke without fear, for business and values  The Indian Express
  2. Industrialist Rahul Bajaj, Former Chairman Of Bajaj Group, Dies At 83  NDTV
  3. Rahul Bajaj No More: Industrialist & Ex-Chairman Of Bajaj Auto Passes Away At 83  Republic World
  4. Bizman for the world, a strong Gandhian for friends, near ones  Times of India
  5. 'Who can forget Hamara Bajaj?': Pianist Louiz Banks  Deccan Herald
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: After assuming charge at the Bajaj Group in 1965, Rahul – who was named by India’s first Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru – helmed it for four decades and built a global manufacturing company, before handing over flagship Bajaj Auto’s keys to son Rajiv Bajaj in 2005.
